channel.title: Internships on Bob Chou
channel.description: Recent content in Internships on Bob Chou

item.title: Hulu LLC, Ad Platform
item.description: Software Engineer Intern (Jun 2020 – Aug 2020): React, Elasticsearch, Node, Express, MySQL, Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, Designed, implemented, and deployed a full-stack search tool for ad campaigns with 400x speedup: Built a search engine on top of MySQL with Elasticsearch, and deployed on AWS EC2 with Terraform Designed, built, dockerized, and deployed a MySQL ingestor with Logstash and JDBC on Kubernetes Developed a search tool with React, Node, & Express, and integrated into the internal product

item.title: Intel Co.,Ltd., Big Data Technology
item.description: Software Engineer Intern (Jan 2019 – July 2019): Spark, TensorFlow/Keras, Docker, Contributed to the development of Analytics Zoo, an open-source distributed deep learning platform: Built end-to-end distributed model pipelines of Analytics Zoo with BigDL, Spark, and TensorFlow Ported and dockerized TensorFlow projects to automatic distributed pipelines on Kubernetes cluster

item.title: YITU Tech Inc., R&D Department
item.description: Machine Learning Intern (Jun 2018 – Sept 2018): TensorFlow, Caffe, Refined, accelerated, and deployed real-world at-scale AI software system: Applied knowledge distillation and integrated feature pyramid networks (FPN) to SSD/MobileNetV2 Achieved3.4xspeedupand3%recallimprovement(98%intotal)forrealtimemultitaskobjectdetection
